question.body: Which of the following are hormones produced by the pancreas?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas. Glucose is a simple sugar.
Incorrect. Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas but calcitonin is produced by the thyroid.
Correct. Insulin and glucagon are both hormones produced by the pancreas.
Incorrect. Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas. Glycogen is a carbohydrate the stores energy.
